songs.title: Secret Weapon
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Can I tell you a secret?
You promise that you'll keep it?
Cross your heart, not a soul
There's so much that you don't know
(You don't even know)

[Chorus]
I'm about to break, I'm about to shake
I'm an interruption, do you wanna face
Do you wanna taste my secret weapon?
My aim is steady, I'm locked and ready
To blow your mind, make you feel divine
With my affection, I'm a secret weapon

[Verse 2]
Just when you least expect it
I'll whip out my wicked weapon
You'd never know, I hide it well
Just like Heaven, just like Hell
(You want it, I can tell)

[Chorus]
I'm about to break, I'm about to shake
I'm an interruption, do you wanna face
Do you wanna taste my secret weapon?
My aim is steady, I'm locked and ready
To blow your mind, make you feel divine
With my affection, I'm a secret weapon

[Bridge]
Lay your arms down
You can't fight it
Surrender to me
'Cause I have no mercy

[Chorus]
I'm about to break, I'm about to shake
I'm an interruption, do you wanna face
Do you wanna taste my secret weapon?
My aim is steady, I'm locked and ready
To blow your mind, make you feel divine
With my affection, I'm a secret weapon
I'm a secret weapon (are you ready?)
So if you're ready, I'll rock you steady
Gonna blow your mind, make you feel divine
With my affection, I'm a secret weapon
I'm a secret weapon
